name: Lone Rogue
card_set: Empire Strikes Back Introductory Two Player Game
Lore: 'The pilots at the Rebel Base on Hoth are trained to respond quickly to the Empire''s forces. Many Rebels feel that they could take on the whole Empire themselves.',
Text: 'If one of your pilots is at an exterior Hoth site, use 2 Force to search your Reserve Deck and take one T-47 into hand. OR If your piloted T-47 is defending a battle alone at a site, add one battle destiny.',
